name: Tower Power (Lucky Clover Dev)
description:
Don't let the hordes of your enemies defeat you!Use the power of the cards to defend the tower!Controls

Aim — Mouse

Shoot — Left Mouse-Button

Choose a Card — Left Mouse-Button

How to Play

Shoot enemies, gain experience, level up!

Upon levelling up, three cards will appear on screen.

Hover the mouse over these cards to show what upgrades they hold.

Survive as long as you can!
